title: The Fly = A Legy
brief_description: Creatively animated in sepia print, this Academy Award winnning short provides a fly’s eye view of the world. Sensing the approach of autumn, the fly, hoping for safety, takes shelter in a house. Without commentary, sound effects only. Award: AMPAS 1980 Academy Award for Best Animated Short Subject. Suitable for middle and upper primary and lower secondary levels.
